rules_text: Creature cards in your graveyard have revive {2}{B}{B}. [i]({2}{B}{B}, Exile this card from your graveyard: Create a token that's a copy of it except it has no mana cost. Revive only as a sorcery.)[/i]
flavor_text:
[i]“It's been so long, I'm glad to be back.”
—Oscar Jones, Lost Explorer[/i]
